Class Forme

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Forme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Oval, Polygon, Rectangle

    public abstract class Forme
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe de gestion des formes.
    Author:
    François Lamothe Guillaume Leccoq Alexandre Ravaux
